avSummary: so, thus, like manner, well, such thing, howbeit, state, after that, following, after this, therefore, wherefore, surely
definition:
adv
 1) so, therefore, thus
    1a) thus, so
    1b) just so
    1c) therefore
    1d) so...as (paired with adv)
    1e) then
    1f) forasmuch as (in phrase)
    1g) (with prep)
        1g1) therefore, this being so (specific)
        1g2) hitherto
        1g3) therefore, on this ground (general)
        1g4) afterwards
        1g5) in such case

 adj
 2) right, just, honest, true, veritable
    2a) right, just, honest
    2b) correct
    2c) true, veritable
    2d) true!, right!, correct! (in assent)
